channel.title: Slayer handler errors

item.title: Slayer handler errors
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

When it says ‘)’ needed, what do you think you should do?
What about ‘;’ needed? If there’s one in there, then you need to fix that line.

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer handler errors
item.dc:creator: @mr_monkey mr monkey
item.description:
@mr_monkey wrote:

[code]client.java:32471: ‘)’ expected
sendFrame126(“Very well, go and kill @dre@”+server.skillHandler.slayerHandler.ge
tMyKill s(playerId)+" “+GetNpcName(server.skillHandler.slayerHandler.get MyMonst
ers(playerId))+”'s", 4903);

   ^

client.java:32471: ‘)’ expected
sendFrame126(“Very well, go and kill @dre@”+server.skillHandler.slayerHandler.ge
tMyKill s(playerId)+" “+GetNpcName(server.skillHandler.slayerHandler.get MyMonst
ers(playerId))+”'s", 4903);

                                                                    ^

client.java:32471: not a statement
sendFrame126(“Very well, go and kill @dre@”+server.skillHandler.slayerHandler.ge
tMyKill s(playerId)+" “+GetNpcName(server.skillHandler.slayerHandler.get MyMonst
ers(playerId))+”'s", 4903);

                   ^

client.java:32471: ‘;’ expected
sendFrame126(“Very well, go and kill @dre@”+server.skillHandler.slayerHandler.ge
tMyKill s(playerId)+" “+GetNpcName(server.skillHandler.slayerHandler.get MyMonst
ers(playerId))+”'s", 4903);

         ^

client.java:33770: ‘)’ expected
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(MonstersKille d), 0, Integer.toString(Monst
ersKilled).length());
^
client.java:33770: not a statement
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(MonstersKille d), 0, Integer.toString(Monst
ersKilled).length());
^
client.java:33770: ‘;’ expected
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(MonstersKille d), 0, Integer.toString(Monst
ersKilled).length());
^
client.java:33770: ‘;’ expected
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(MonstersKille d), 0, Integer.toString(Monst
ersKilled).length());

               ^

SlayerHandler.java:113: ‘)’ expected
p.sendQuest("@dre@"+GetMonsterLocation(p.GetNpcNam e(p.Slayer)), 8152);
^
SlayerHandler.java:113: ‘;’ expected
p.sendQuest("@dre@"+GetMonsterLocation(p.GetNpcNam e(p.Slayer)), 8152);
^
10 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

how do i fix?
